verses.verse: If one be found <S%H4672><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, <S%H5307><s%> lying in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and it isn't <S%H3045><s%> known who has struck him; <S%H5221><s%>

then your elders <S%H2205><s%> and your judges <S%H8199><s%> shall come forth, <S%H3318><s%> and they shall measure <S%H4058><s%> to the cities <S%H5892><s%> which are around <S%H5439><s%> him who is slain: <S%H2491><s%>

and it shall be, <S%H5892><s%> that the city which is nearest <S%H7138><s%> to the slain man, <S%H2491><s%> even the elders <S%H2205><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> a heifer <S%H1241><s%> of the herd, <S%H5647><s%> which hasn't been worked with, and which has not drawn <S%H4900><s%> in the yoke; <S%H5923><s%>

and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%> shall bring down <S%H3381><s%> the heifer <S%H5697><s%> to a <S%H386><s%> valley <S%H5158><s%> with running water, <S%H5647><s%> which is neither plowed nor sown, <S%H2232><s%> and shall break <S%H6202><s%> the heifer <S%H5697><s%>'s neck <S%H6202><s%> there in the valley. <S%H5158><s%>

The priests <S%H3548><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> shall come near; <S%H5066><s%> for them Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> to him, <S%H1288><s%> and to bless in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and according to their word <S%H6310><s%> shall every controversy <S%H7379><s%> and every stroke be. <S%H5061><s%>

All the elders <S%H2205><s%> of that city, <S%H5892><s%> who are nearest <S%H7138><s%> to the slain <S%H2491><s%> man, <S%H7364><s%> shall wash their hands <S%H3027><s%> over the heifer <S%H5697><s%> whose neck was broken <S%H6202><s%> in the valley; <S%H5158><s%>
and they shall answer <S%H6030><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> "Our hands <S%H3027><s%> have not shed <S%H8210><s%> this blood, <S%H1818><s%> neither have our eyes <S%H5869><s%> seen it. <S%H7200><s%>

Forgive, <S%H3722><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom you have redeemed, <S%H6299><s%> and don't <S%H5414><s%> allow innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>" The blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be forgiven them. <S%H3722><s%>

So you shall put away <S%H1197><s%> the innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> from the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you, <S%H6213><s%> when you shall do that which is right <S%H3477><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

When you go forth <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against your enemies, <S%H341><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> delivers <S%H5414><s%> them into your hands, <S%H3027><s%> and you carry <S%H7617><s%> them away captive, <S%H7628><s%>

and see <S%H7200><s%> among the captives <S%H7633><s%> a beautiful <S%H8389><s%> woman, <S%H802><s%> and you have a desire <S%H2836><s%> to her, <S%H3947><s%> and would take her to you as wife; <S%H802><s%>
then you shall bring <S%H935><s%> her home <S%H8432><s%> to your house; <S%H1004><s%> and she shall shave <S%H1548><s%> her head, <S%H7218><s%> and pare <S%H6213><s%> her nails; <S%H6856><s%>

and she shall put <S%H5493><s%> the clothing <S%H8071><s%> of her captivity <S%H7628><s%> from off her, <S%H3427><s%> and shall remain in your house, <S%H1004><s%> and bewail <S%H1058><s%> her father <S%H1><s%> and her mother <S%H517><s%> a full <S%H3117><s%> month: <S%H3391><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> that you shall go <S%H935><s%> in to her, <S%H1166><s%> and be her husband, and she shall be your wife. <S%H802><s%>

It shall be, <S%H2654><s%> if you have no delight in her, <S%H7971><s%> then you shall let her go where she will; <S%H5315><s%> but you shall not sell <S%H4376><s%> her at all <S%H4376><s%> for money, <S%H3701><s%> you shall not deal <S%H6014><s%> with her as a slave, <S%H834><s%> because you have humbled her. <S%H6031><s%>

If a man <S%H376><s%> have two <S%H8147><s%> wives, <S%H802><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> beloved, <S%H157><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> hated, <S%H8130><s%> and they have borne <S%H3205><s%> him children, <S%H1121><s%> both the beloved <S%H157><s%> and the hated; <S%H8130><s%> and if the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> be hers who was hated; <S%H8146><s%>

then it shall be, <S%H3117><s%> in the day that he causes his sons <S%H1121><s%> to inherit <S%H5157><s%> that which he has, <S%H3201><s%> that he may not make the son <S%H1121><s%> of the beloved <S%H157><s%> the firstborn <S%H1069><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of the hated, <S%H8130><s%> who is the firstborn: <S%H1060><s%>

but he shall acknowledge <S%H5234><s%> the firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of the hated, <S%H8130><s%> by giving <S%H5414><s%> him a double <S%H8147><s%> portion <S%H6310><s%> of all that he has; <S%H4672><s%> for he is the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of his strength; <S%H202><s%> the right <S%H4941><s%> of the firstborn is his. <S%H1062><s%>

If a man <S%H376><s%> have a stubborn <S%H5637><s%> and rebellious <S%H4784><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> who will not obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his father, <S%H1><s%> or the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his mother, <S%H517><s%> and, <S%H3256><s%> though they chasten him, <S%H8085><s%> will not listen to them;

then shall his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> lay hold <S%H8610><s%> on him, <S%H3318><s%> and bring him out to the elders <S%H2205><s%> of his city, <S%H5892><s%> and to the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his place; <S%H4725><s%>

and they shall tell <S%H559><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of his city, <S%H5892><s%> "This our son <S%H1121><s%> is stubborn <S%H5637><s%> and rebellious, <S%H4784><s%> he will not obey <S%H8085><s%> our voice; <S%H6963><s%> he is a glutton, <S%H2151><s%> and a drunkard. <S%H5433><s%>"

All the men <S%H582><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> shall stone <S%H7275><s%> him to death <S%H4191><s%> with stones: <S%H7275><s%> so you shall put <S%H1197><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> from the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you; <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel shall hear, <S%H8085><s%> and fear. <S%H3372><s%>
If a man <S%H376><s%> have committed a sin <S%H2399><s%> worthy of <S%H4941><s%> death, <S%H4194><s%> and he be put to death, <S%H4194><s%> and you hang <S%H8518><s%> him on a tree; <S%H6086><s%>

his body <S%H5038><s%> shall not remain all night <S%H3885><s%> on the tree, <S%H6086><s%> but you shall surely <S%H6912><s%> bury <S%H6912><s%> him the same day; <S%H3117><s%> for he who is hanged <S%H8518><s%> is accursed <S%H7045><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> that you don't <S%H2930><s%> defile your land <S%H127><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you for an inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
